+++ 
@@ -10,5 +10,21 @@
             </xpath>
 
         </field>
     </record>
+
+            <!-- Inherit the form view of account.move where you want to add the button -->
+        <record id="view_account_move_form_inherit" model="ir.ui.view">
+            <field name="name">account.move.form.inherit</field>
+            <field name="model">account.move</field>
+            <field name="inherit_id" ref="account.view_move_form"/> <!-- Reference to the original view -->
+            <field name="arch" type="xml">
+                <!-- Locate the position where you want to add the button -->
+                <!-- This might be a specific field (like 'amount_total') or the end of a group -->
+                <xpath expr="//field[@name='amount_total']" position="after"> <!-- adjust the field name as needed -->
+                    <!-- Add the button with an action -->
+                    <button string="Fix Amount" type="object" name="button_fix_amount" class="oe_highlight"/>
+                </xpath>
+            </field>
+        </record>
+
 </odoo>

             </field>

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<odoo>
    <record id="view_account_form_inherit" model="ir.ui.view">
        <field name="name">account.move.form.inherit</field>
        <field name="model">account.move</field>
        <field name="inherit_id" ref="account.view_move_form"/>
        <field name="arch" type="xml">
            <xpath expr="//form" position="attributes">
               <attribute name="class">account_move_inherit_table</attribute>
            </xpath>

            <xpath expr="//page[@id='invoice_tab']//tree//control" position="after">
                <!-- <field name="row_counter_column" class="counter_column" invisible="1"/> -->
            </xpath>

        </field>
    </record>
</odoo>
